subject: Football
Officiating (Sports)
Lockouts
Labor and Jobs
lead_paragraph: After a weekend of negotiations between the N.F.L. and its locked-out officials, significant differences remain between the two sides, according to a memo from the league’s general counsel.
snippet: After a weekend of negotiations between the N.F.L. and its locked-out officials, significant differences remain between the two sides, according to a memo from the league’s general counsel.
